entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Casting a literal `true` or `false` to a function pointer crashes csc.exe #75933
  • `InteractiveHostDesktopTests.Bitness` test fails on VS 17.12 #75932

Closed

  • Secondary dashed line appears in raw string literals #59598
    Backlog
  • Typing <enter> in single-line raw string literal should convert it to multiline. #59347
    Backlog
  • Comment Selection command doesn't work in .editorconfig file #60073
    Backlog
  • Imperfect IEnumerable<T> -> Span<T> collection expression conversion #71755
    Backlog
  • Poor codegen for collection expression spread (IEnumerable<T> -> ImmutableArray<T>) #71296
    Backlog
  • incorrect fix prompt for unreachable code #75929
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35514.242 #75931
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35514.35 #75927

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce allocations by creating an array builder class that allows span usage #75940
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Add server side support for refreshing source generated files #75939
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use auto properties #75936
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Consider RefSafetyRules with UnscopedRef #75930
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Send over the new sourcetext's content checksum when sending notification of textchanges #75928
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Add params vs normal form test #75937
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged, Next
  • Add runtime async design doc #75816
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Next
  • Do not show structure guides on raw string literals #75938
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Convert single-line raw strings into multi-line on pressing <enter> #75648
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix UpdateBaseline failure when no valid change has been made before baseline update #75934
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Optimize single spread of IEnumerable to array #75847
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update Language Feature Status.md #75935
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Next
  • Update .NET 9 runtime for single machine CI job #75889
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • EE: Support compact name in `IDkmLanguageInstructionDecoder.GetMethodName()` implementation #75764
    Area-Compilers, Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify shape of APIs used for Overload Resolution Priority feature #75891
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority, Next
  • Update parsing code for conditional access expressions #75849
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Ensure NFW gets reported before result is reported to client and remove async listener in queue #75907
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Enable TypeDefinitionProvider LSP capability #75819
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Reduce IVsFreeThreadedFileChangeEvents2.DirectoryChangedEx2 notifications from VS shell #75815
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Clear hoisted locals when disposing iterator and async-iterator state machines #75908
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support unbound generic types in 'nameof' operator. #75368
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • VB: Check overload resolution priority for basic scenarios involving methods #75862
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority, 17.13 P2
  • Test some assumptions (2) in OverloadResolution.vb #75792
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
